data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maaɲɛɛi ɠa ga zɛɛ ɠɔɠɔ bo ganiiti,
Wasogi ʋolu anii ɠa é ga wɔinzeɠemai,
Ladalai ɠa loni sɔle nuiti tuɠɔ,
Naavoloi la levea ga ani nɔpɛ, tukpɔɠaaleʋe voloi,
Telebo nui ná-ladalai ɠa ɗa ná-eteai zɔle,
Telebo nui ná-sɔlegi ɠa ɗa kizo faaɓaagiti ma,
Siɛgi zu nu ɲɔi zaazu la, ná-kitogi pɛ ge ɠoloɠologa,
Telebo nui ɠa ɠula kidaaʋiligi zu,
Nui é ɠɛlɛzu GALA ba, naa ɠa ɗa zɔiti koloɠolo ga daawooiti,
Siɛgi zu telebo nuiti undaanɛɛzu la, taai kpein koozu ɠa ɗa nɛ,
Sɔle nuiti daa luyai ɠa ɗa ʋa ga ɓɔɠɔzɔlɔɔgi ta-laazuʋɛ.
Zɔi é seiɲɔɠɔi ʋɛlɛʋilisu, naa la ga faaɠaaɠaa nu,
Fama wo nui ɠa ɗa dɔɔɠuzu vaiti kula kɛlɛma,
Siɛgi zu totuɠɔ ʋagɔ la zooi ʋɛ la, nuɓusɛiti ta ɗa loo bu,
Zɔi é yeelaazu wɛɛn maaɠuyei ɠa, toɠa ɓaa ma,
Anzanu ʋagɔi ɠa ɗa lɛbiyai zɔlɔɔ,
Zunui é nuɓɔɠɔlai ɠɛɛzu, naa ɠa kɛɛzu ɓɔɠɔ nɔ ʋɛ,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa yaava lɔnɔgi ɠaiziɛ,
Zekana, telebodai ɠaaɓelazuʋɛ ɠa ga zɛnvui,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI la wɔinni ga naati, niiti ti-yiimaʋɛ laavegai ga yaavai,
Gaamazu, faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti salalalai la yɛga,
Anzanui nii pagai, kɛlɛ balagai ɠigi ma,
Telebo nuiti wɔinma vaa ɠila kpegi nɔ ɠa faa ʋagɔi.
Tanigaa ta ɗa faanɛɛi ɠɛ gola, tama ti ɗa wola ɓɛtɛ.
Faanɛɛ ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa sɔlɔɔgi wo gola,
Nuɓusɛiti ta ɗa molo makɛ nui voovo, zɔi é ɠɛɛzu, é ʋa pɔdi ga daaɓaai,
Zɔi é faa ʋagɔi ɠɛɛ vai ɠaiziɛzu, naa ɠa ɗa undaanɛɛi zɔlɔɔ,
Zɔi a ʋoluzei ná-naavoloi ʋa, naa ɠa loo bu,
Zɔi a gooɠaavazagi lɔɔna ná-pɛlɛyeɠei wu, toɠa sulɔnɔgi zɔlɔɔ ga fiilɛ wolai,
Telebo nui ná-kɛɛwotiiti ta ga zɛnvu wului,
Ni telebo nui ɠa zalai zɔlɔɔsu gaamanɔ eteai zu,
